data.name: CT0001_Title
data.value: Control flow statement without braces must contain only return, throw, continue, break, or yield break

data.name: CT0001_MessageFormat
data.value: Control flow statement without braces can only contain return, throw, continue, break, or yield break statements

data.name: CT0001_Description
data.value: Control flow statements without braces should only contain simple control flow statements to prevent bugs and improve readability.

data.name: CT0002_Title
data.value: Enum properties should not be assigned literal values

data.name: CT0002_MessageFormat
data.value: Enum property '{0}' should not be assigned literal value '{1}'. Use the appropriate enum value instead

data.name: CT0002_Description
data.value: Enum properties should be assigned enum values rather than literal numeric values to improve code readability and maintainability.

data.name: CT0003_Title
data.value: Remove empty parentheses from object initialization

data.name: CT0003_MessageFormat
data.value: Object initialization should not use empty parentheses. Remove '()' from 'new {0}()' when using object initializer

data.name: CT0003_Description
data.value: Object initialization with empty parentheses followed by an initializer is unnecessary and should be avoided for cleaner code.

data.name: CT0004_Title
data.value: Control flow statement with braces containing only control flow should not have braces

data.name: CT0004_MessageFormat
data.value: Block containing only a control flow statement (return, throw, continue, break, or yield break) should not have braces

data.name: CT0004_Description
data.value: When a block contains only a single control flow statement, braces should be omitted to improve code readability and consistency.
